text: Lancelot J. "Lance" Acord (born September 9, 1964) A.S.C.American Society of Cinematographers. is an American cinematographer. Acord was born in Fresno County, California. He attended Sir Francis Drake High School's School Within A School (S.W.A.S.) program and went on to study photography and filmmaking at the San Francisco Art Institute. He began his professional career with Bruce Weber and together, they made documentaries, commercials and music videos. His latest directorial work is E.T.: A Holiday Reunion. ==References== ==Other websites== * Lance Acord's production company ParkPictures * Lance Acord at SFX company Method Studio * * Lance Acord at mvdbase * Lance Acord at Cinematographers.nl Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:American cinematographers Category:People from California Category:Fresno County, California
title: Lance Acord
